sentence: FIRST ON FOX: Firebrand Rep. Madison Cawthorn is endorsing Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel Monday as yet another national figure gets involved in the Buckeye State's high-profile GOP primary.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Ohio GOP Senate showdown: Firebrand Rep. Cawthorn endorses Josh Mandel in crowded Republican primary

sentence: House ? NC-11: It's impossible to fit every article of freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn's dirty laundry into one 30-second commercial, but Sen. Thom Tillis' allies at Results for NC do the best they can in their newest spot for the May 17 GOP primary.
title: Morning Digest: How an unknown QAnon candidate shocked the Ohio GOP establishment on Tuesday night
